text: Democrats targeted in wave of Thanksgiving bomb threats … - Reps. Elise Stefanik (R-N.Y.) and Lori Chavez-DeRemer (R-Ore.), former Rep. Lee Zeldin (R-N.Y.) and Pete Hegseth - Trump's picks for U.N. ambassador, labor secretary, EPA administrator and defense secretary, respectively - were among the targets.

Multiple Democrats say they were targeted by Thanksgiving bomb threats  —  Multiple Connecticut Democrats said they were targeted by bomb threats on their homes on Thanksgiving Day.  —  Rep. Jim Himes (D-Conn.) said on Thursday that he was notified of a bomb threat targeting his Connecticut home.

Democratic members of Congress get bomb threats on Thanksgiving  —  The threats follow some to Trump's Cabinet selections earlier in the week.  —  The U.S. Capitol in Washington, Nov. 23, 2024.  —  The homes of multiple Democratic members of Congress in Connecticut were targeted by bomb threats on Thanksgiving Day.

Bill Clinton makes stunning confession about his bizarre behavior after Hillary's defeat in America's ‘darkest election’  —  President Bill Clinton was so enraged by the treatment of his wife, Hillary, during her failed presidential bid that he couldn't sleep for two years, he now admits - or stop complaining about the shock defeat.

Bill Clinton 'Couldn't Sleep for Two Years' After 2016 Election  —  LAMENT  —  Former president Bill Clinton said he could not sleep for two years after the 2016 election, which his wife Hillary Clinton lost to Donald Trump.  Clinton makes the admission in his new book, Citizen …

My Brother Is Doing the Trump Dance  —  I know that every year, some of you see this Thanksgiving column by my brother and think that it is actually I who am serving up this slab of red meat under the nom de plume of Kevin Dowd.  I can assure you that Kevin is very real and, this year, very excited.

Biden on Trump's tariff plan: ‘I hope he rethinks it’  —  President Biden said Thursday that he hopes President-elect Trump “rethinks” some of his tariff plans.  —  “I hope he rethinks it.  I think it's a counterproductive thing to do,” the president said in Nantucket, Mass. …

Statement from President Joe Biden on Russia's Attack on Ukraine  —  Overnight, Russia carried out a horrific aerial attack against Ukraine.  Ukrainian authorities report that Russia launched nearly 200 missiles and drones against Ukrainian cities and energy infrastructure, depriving Ukrainian civilians of access to electricity.

Louise Haigh quits UK government as transport secretary over stolen phone ‘mistake’  —  Louise Haigh resigned as U.K. transport secretary after Sky News reported she had been convicted of falsely telling police her work mobile phone had been stolen in 2013.  —  Haigh sent a letter of resignation …

Boise State Forfeits Against SJSU, Transgender Blaire Fleming In Stunning Show Of Protest  —  LAS VEGAS, NV - In a stunning turn of events, the Boise State Broncos women's volleyball team announced that it will forfeit its semifinal match in the Mountain West Tournament against San Jose State.
